name: shorts-deflector
description: Seamlessly play YouTube Shorts with the normal desktop interface.
author: Attituding <attituding@outlook.com>

scripts.build: npm run tailwindcss && npm run typescript && npm run zip
scripts.clear: rmdir dist /s /q && rmdir src\vendors\chromium\resources /s /q && rmdir src\vendors\firefox\resources /s /q && rmdir src\vendors\chromium\scripts /s /q && rmdir src\vendors\firefox\scripts /s /q
scripts.tailwindcss: npx tailwindcss -i src/resources/source.css -o src/vendors/chromium/resources/tailwind.css && npx tailwindcss -i src/resources/source.css -o src/vendors/firefox/resources/tailwind.css
scripts.zip: powershell New-Item dist -force -type directory && cd src/vendors/chromium && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/chromium.zip * && cd ../firefox && 7z a -tzip ../../../dist/firefox.zip *
